import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { solid } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core/import.macro'; const Index = ({ open, setOpen, size }) => { const [isDisabled, setIsDisplayed] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { size.width >= 1200 ? setIsDisplayed(true) : setIsDisplayed(false) }, [size.width]); return (
